ViewObject.Name: XxwipBatchTotalVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT gmd.batch_id batch_id ,SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = -1) AND (gmd.attribute5 IS NULL) AND (xic.item_class_code <> 2)) THEN xmd.invested_qty ELSE 0 END) total_invest_num -- 投入計 ,TO_CHAR( SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = -1) AND (gmd.attribute5 IS NULL) AND (xic.item_class_code <> 2)) THEN xmd.invested_qty ELSE 0 END), 'FM999,999,990.000') total_invest -- 投入計 ,TO_CHAR( SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = -1) AND (gmd.attribute5 = 'Y') AND (xic.item_class_code <> 2)) THEN xmd.invested_qty ELSE 0 END), 'FM999,999,990.000') total_re_invest -- 打込計 ,TO_CHAR( SUM( CASE WHEN (gmd.line_type = 2 AND (xic.item_class_code <> 5)) THEN gmd.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 'FM999,999,990.000') total_co_prod -- 副産物計 ,TO_CHAR( SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = 1) AND (xic.item_class_code = 5)) THEN ROUND(ximv.net * gmd.actual_qty /1000, 3) WHEN ((gmd.line_type = 1) AND (xic.item_class_code <> 5)) THEN gmd.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) - SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = -1) AND (gmd.attribute5 = 'Y') AND (xic.item_class_code <> 2)) THEN xmd.invested_qty ELSE 0 END), 'FM999,999,990.000') total_fin -- 仕上計 ,TO_CHAR( SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = -1) AND (gmd.attribute5 IS NULL) AND (xic.item_class_code <> 2)) THEN xmd.invested_qty - xmd.return_qty ELSE 0 END) - (SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = 1) AND (xic.item_class_code = 5) AND (ximv.item_um = '本')) THEN ROUND(ximv.net * gmd.actual_qty /1000, 3) WHEN ((gmd.line_type = 1) AND (xic.item_class_code = 5) AND (ximv.item_um <> '本')) THEN gmd.actual_qty WHEN ((gmd.line_type = 1) AND (xic.item_class_code <> 5)) THEN gmd.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) - SUM( CASE WHEN ((gmd.line_type = -1) AND (gmd.attribute5 = 'Y') AND (xic.item_class_code <> 2)) THEN xmd.invested_qty - xmd.return_qty ELSE 0 END) + SUM( CASE WHEN (gmd.line_type = 2 AND (xic.item_class_code <> 5)) THEN gmd.actual_qty ELSE 0 END)), 'FM999,999,990.000') total_cut -- 計込／切れ FROM gme_material_details gmd -- 生産原料詳細 ,xxwip_material_detail xmd -- 生産原料詳細アドオン ,xxcmn_item_categories3_v xic -- 品目カテゴリ情報VIEW3 ,xxcmn_item_mst_v ximv -- OPM品目マスタビュー WHERE /* 結合条件 */ gmd.material_detail_id = xmd.material_detail_id(+) AND gmd.item_id = xic.item_id AND gmd.item_id = ximv.item_id /* 抽出条件 */ AND gmd.attribute24 IS NULL AND gmd.batch_id = TO_NUMBER(:1) GROUP BY gmd.batch_id
